dcterms:creator: M. D. Kohli
R. M. Summers
J. R. Geis
dcterms:description: A dataset of chest X-rays (PA view) collected from Seoul Asan Medical Center, consisting of 931 images with pixel labels for 1007 pulmonary nodules and 2986 images without labels, annotated by three board certified radiologists.
dcterms:title: Chest X-rays (PA view)

dcterms:creator: S. Park
W. Hwang
K. H. Jung
J. B. Seo
N. Kim
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on pulmonary nodules in chest X-rays, utilized for reducing false positives in detection through active mining of negative samples.
dcterms:title: Pulmonary nodules in chest X-rays
